live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
61559.summary: Some customers in the Downtown & Southwest Hill areas of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61559.title: May 26 - Medicine Hat  (Downtown & Southwest Hill) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
